definition: old variant of 曆|历[li4]/old variant of 歷|历[li4]
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: The city still stands though much changed.
sentences.chinese: 那个城市虽然历经沧海桑田依然健在。
这些植物历经寒霜而存活了。

sentences.english: Holy stream temple has more than ten outlet through millennium still limpid.
sentences.chinese: 圣泉寺中有十多个出水口，历经千年依然清澈。

sentences.english: After experiencing lots of bitterness and sorrow, they finally reached the West.
sentences.chinese: 两人历经千辛万苦，终于到达西天。

sentences.english: It was like an old man and had seen all kinds of departure.
sentences.chinese: 它就像个历经沧桑的老人，亲历过各种离愁别绪。

sentences.english: China's aircraft leasing business has an experience of more than 20 years, but still in its infancy.
sentences.chinese: 中国的飞机租赁业历经20余年，仍处于起步阶段。

sentences.english: After several generations, some geniuses are born to rewrite history.
sentences.chinese: 历经数代之后，一些可以改写历史的天才诞生了。

sentences.english: This old pine has undergone extreme weather but still stands tall and straight.
sentences.chinese: 这棵百年老松历经了百年风雨依然树身劲拔。

sentences.english: After eighty adventurous experiences, Tang Sanzang finally got the real Buddhist scripture.
sentences.chinese: 唐三藏历经九九八十一难终于取得了真经。

sentences.english: Five years on, the card is an increasingly sought-after document.
sentences.chinese: 历经5年，中国绿卡正变得越来越抢手。

sentences.english: The federalization of modern Switzerland took more than 200 years.
sentences.chinese: 现代瑞士国家的形成前后历经二百余年。

sentences.english: After 60 years, moreover, the United Nations is still an experiment.
sentences.chinese: 而且，尽管历经60年，联合国至今仍是一个试验。

sentences.english: Glass has a development history of over 3000 years in China.
sentences.chinese: 中国玻璃器的发展历经三千多年。

sentences.english: Behind the target of socialist law-governing state, there lies historical desperate decision.
sentences.chinese: 我国社会主义法治国家目标的确立历经艰难的选择。

sentences.english: This railway station remains standing despite having experienced numerous earthquakes.
sentences.chinese: 这座火车站虽然历经多次地震，却仍屹立不摇。

sentences.english: Since Chukan now, "Red River Valley" has already experienced two years of wind and rain.
sentences.chinese: 自出刊至今，《红河谷》已历经两年的风雨。

definition: to have experienced a lot of/to have been through
to go through numerous (setbacks, revisions etc)
to extend as long as/to lengthen out to
to have been through the hardships of life/to have been through the mill
deposits accumulated over long periods/fig. valuable experience, accumulated wisdom
lit. to comb one's hair in the wind and wash it in the rain (idiom)/fig. to work in the open regardless of the weather
wind and rain/the elements/trials and hardships
